name: Alaborn Musketeer
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Muskets gave the Alaborn army an advantage it had long lacked—air defense.

name: Alaborn Trooper
flavor_text: "I dedicate my body to my countryAnd my life to my King." —Alaborn Soldier's Oath

name: Angelic Voices
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 as long as you control no nonartifact, nonwhite creatures.

name: Argivian Blacksmith
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target artifact creature this turn.
flavor_text: Through years of study and training, the Blacksmiths of Argive became adept at reassembling the mangled remains of the strange, mechanical creatures abounding in their native land.

name: Armageddon
oracle_text: Destroy all lands.
flavor_text: "'O miserable of happy! Is this the endOf this new glorious world . . . ?'" —John Milton, Paradise Lost

name: Balance
oracle_text: Each player chooses a number of lands he or she controls equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

name: Blaze of Glory
oracle_text: Cast Blaze of Glory only during combat before blockers are declared.
Target creature defending player controls can block any number of creatures this turn. It blocks each attacking creature this turn if able.

name: Champion Lancer
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Champion Lancer by creatures.
flavor_text: The flash of his lance projects the pure radiance of his honor.

name: Conversion
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Conversion unless you pay {W}{W}.
All Mountains are Plains.

name: Divine Offering
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its converted mana cost.

name: Dust to Dust
oracle_text: Exile two target artifacts.
flavor_text: "All this nonsense made by mages Rusts and crumbles through the ages." —Aline Corralurn, "Inheritance"

name: Eye for an Eye
oracle_text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, instead that source deals that much damage to you and Eye for an Eye deals that much damage to that source's controller.

name: Harsh Justice
oracle_text: Cast Harsh Justice only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
This turn, whenever an attacking creature deals combat damage to you, it deals that much damage to its controller.

name: Healing Salve
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Target player gains 3 life.
• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.

name: Island Sanctuary
oracle_text: If you would draw a card during your draw step, instead you may skip that draw. If you do, until your next turn, you can't be attacked except by creatures with flying and/or islandwalk.

name: Just Fate
oracle_text: Cast Just Fate only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Destroy target attacking creature.

name: Kismet
oracle_text: Artifacts, creatures, and lands played by your opponents enter the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text: "Make people wait for what they want, and you have power over them. This is as true for merchants and militia as it is for cooks and couples." —Gwendlyn Di Corci

name: Leeches
oracle_text: Target player loses all poison counters. Leeches deals that much damage to that player.
flavor_text: "Where our potions and powders fail, perhaps nature will succeed." —Reyhan, Samite Alchemist

name: Martyr's Cry
oracle_text: Exile all white creatures. For each creature exiled this way, its controller draws a card.
flavor_text: "It is only fitting that one such as I should die in pursuit of knowledge." —Vervamon the Elder

name: Martyrs of Korlis
oracle_text: As long as Martyrs of Korlis is untapped, all damage that would be dealt to you by artifacts is dealt to Martyrs of Korlis instead.

name: Osai Vultures
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, put a carrion counter on Osai Vultures.
Remove two carrion counters from Osai Vultures: Osai Vultures gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Personal Incarnation
oracle_text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Personal Incarnation this turn is dealt to its owner instead. Any player may activate this ability, but only if he or she owns Personal Incarnation.
When Personal Incarnation dies, its owner loses half his or her life, rounded up.

name: Righteous Charge
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Bravery shines brightest in a pure soul.

name: Savannah Lions
flavor_text: The traditional kings of the jungle command a healthy respect in other climates as well. Relying mainly on their stealth and speed, Savannah Lions can take a victim by surprise, even in the endless flat plains of their homeland.

name: Serra Angel
oracle_text: Flying
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
flavor_text: Born with wings of light and a sword of faith, this heavenly incarnation embodies both fury and purity.

name: Serra Aviary
oracle_text: Creatures with flying get +1/+1.
flavor_text: "Serra, like Feroz, is long since dead. But remember, Daria: her spirit shall survive so long as the Homelands do." —Taysir

name: Serra Bestiary
oracle_text: Enchant creature
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Serra Bestiary unless you pay {W}{W}.
Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities with {T} in their costs can't be activated.

name: Spotted Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: When the cat flies and the bird stalks, guard your horses carefully.

name: Steam Catapult
oracle_text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
flavor_text: "You idiots! Turn it around! Turn it around!"

name: Swords to Plowshares
oracle_text: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

name: Temple Acolyte
oracle_text: When Temple Acolyte enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Young, yes. Inexperienced, yes. Weak? Don't count on it.

name: Veteran Bodyguard
oracle_text: As long as Veteran Bodyguard is untapped, all damage that would be dealt to you by unblocked creatures is dealt to Veteran Bodyguard instead.
flavor_text: Good bodyguards are hard to find, mainly because they don't live long.

name: White Knight
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)
flavor_text: Out of the blackness and stench of the engulfing swamp emerged a shimmering figure. Only the splattered armor and ichor-stained sword hinted at the unfathomable evil the knight had just laid waste.

name: Wild Aesthir
oracle_text: Flying, first strike
{W}{W}: Wild Aesthir gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor_text: "High in the Karplusans, death is swift and razor-clawed." —Arna Kennerüd, skycaptain

name: Wild Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Two little goblins, out in the sun. Down came a griffin, and then there was one.

name: Acid Rain
oracle_text: Destroy all Forests.

name: Air Elemental
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: These spirits of the air are winsome and wild and cannot be truly contained. Only marginally intelligent, they often substitute whimsy for strategy, delighting in mischief and mayhem.

name: Animate Artifact
oracle_text: Enchant artifact
As long as enchanted artifact isn't a creature, it's an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost.

name: Blue Elemental Blast
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Counter target red spell.
• Destroy target red permanent.

name: Braingeyser
oracle_text: Target player draws X cards.

name: Cloud Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
Cloud Dragon can block only creatures with flying.

name: Cloud Spirit
oracle_text: Flying
Cloud Spirit can block only creatures with flying.

name: Control Magic
oracle_text: Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.

name: Copy Artifact
oracle_text: You may have Copy Artifact enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield, except it's an enchantment in addition to its other types.

name: Counterspell
oracle_text: Counter target spell.

name: Drain Power
oracle_text: Target player activates a mana ability of each land he or she controls. Then put all mana from that player's mana pool into yours.

name: Drowned
oracle_text: {B}: Regenerate Drowned.
flavor_text: We asked Captain Soll what became of the Serafina, but all he said was, "Ships that go down shouldn't come back up."

name: Energy Flux
oracle_text: All artifacts have "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay {2}."

name: False Summoning
oracle_text: Counter target creature spell.

name: Giant Tortoise
oracle_text: Giant Tortoise gets +0/+3 as long as it's untapped.

name: In the Eye of Chaos
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts an instant spell, counter it unless that player pays {X}, where X is its converted mana cost.

name: Mahamoti Djinn
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Of royal blood amongst the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti Djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

name: Mystic Decree
oracle_text: All creatures lose flying and islandwalk.
flavor_text: "Curse Reveka, and curse her coddled conjurers. Their sorcerers' school shall yet be ours." —Irini Sengir

name: Owl Familiar
oracle_text: Flying
When Owl Familiar enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

name: Phantasmal Forces
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Phantasmal Forces unless you pay {U}.
flavor_text: These beings embody the essence of true heroes long dead. Summoned from the dreamrealms, they rise to meet their enemies.

name: Phantasmal Terrain
oracle_text: Enchant land
As Phantasmal Terrain enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type.
Enchanted land is the chosen type.

name: Power Artifact
oracle_text: Enchant artifact
Enchanted artifact's activated abilities cost {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the amount of mana an ability costs to activate to less than one mana.

name: Prodigal Sorcerer
oracle_text: {T}: Prodigal Sorcerer deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text: Occasionally a member of the Institute of Arcane Study acquires a taste for worldly pleasures. Seldom do they have trouble finding employment.

name: Reconstruction
oracle_text: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Tedious research made the Sages of the College of Lat-Nam adept in repairing broken artifacts.

name: Sea Serpent
oracle_text: Sea Serpent can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
When you control no Islands, sacrifice Sea Serpent.
flavor_text: Legend has it that Serpents used to be bigger, but how could that be?

name: Serendib Djinn
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a land. If you sacrifice an Island this way, Serendib Djinn deals 3 damage to you.
When you control no lands, sacrifice Serendib Djinn.

name: Sleight of Hand
oracle_text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

name: Soldevi Machinist
oracle_text: {T}: Add {2} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to activate abilities of artifacts.

name: Stasis
oracle_text: Players skip their untap steps.
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Stasis unless you pay {U}.

name: Symbol of Unsummoning
oracle_text: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: ". . . inviting the soul to wander for a spell in abysses of solitude . . . ." —Kate Chopin, The Awakening

name: Talas Researcher
oracle_text: {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
flavor_text: From time, knowledge.From knowledge, power.

name: Theft of Dreams
oracle_text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.
flavor_text: Energy is never lost, only transformed.

name: Thing from the Deep
oracle_text: Whenever Thing from the Deep attacks, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice an Island.
flavor_text: Seafarers fear sailing off the world's edge not so much as down its gullet.

name: Transmute Artifact
oracle_text: Sacrifice an artifact. If you do, search your library for an artifact card. If that card's converted mana cost is less than or equal to the sacrificed artifact's converted mana cost, put it onto the battlefield. If it's greater, you may pay {X}, where X is the difference. If you do, put it onto the battlefield. If you don't, put it into its owner's graveyard. Then shuffle your library.

name: Water Elemental
flavor_text: Unpredictable as the sea itself, water elementals shift without warning from tranquility to tempest. Capricious and fickle, they flow restlessly from one shape to another, expressing their moods with their physical forms.

name: Black Knight
oracle_text: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)
flavor_text: Battle doesn't need a purpose; the battle is its own purpose. You don't ask why a plague spreads or a field burns. Don't ask why I fight.

name: Cyclopean Mummy
oracle_text: When Cyclopean Mummy dies, exile it.

name: Dakmor Plague
oracle_text: Dakmor Plague deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text: The tiniest cough can be deadlier than the fiercest dragon.

name: Dark Ritual
oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B} to your mana pool.

name: Deathgrip
oracle_text: {B}{B}: Counter target green spell.

name: Demonic Hordes
oracle_text: {T}: Destroy target land.
At the beginning of your upkeep, unless you pay {B}{B}{B}, tap Demonic Hordes and sacrifice a land of an opponent's choice.
flavor_text: Created to destroy Dominiaria, demons can sometimes be bent to a more focused purpose.

name: Demonic Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

name: Dread Reaper
oracle_text: Flying
When Dread Reaper enters the battlefield, you lose 5 life.

name: Dread Wight
oracle_text: At end of combat, put a paralyzation counter on each creature blocking or blocked by Dread Wight and tap those creatures. Each of those creatures doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as it has a paralyzation counter on it. Each of those creatures gains "{4}: Remove a paralyzation counter from this creature."

name: Ebon Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
When Ebon Dragon enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent discard a card.

name: Foul Spirit
oracle_text: Flying
When Foul Spirit enters the battlefield, sacrifice a land.

name: Gate to Phyrexia
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Destroy target artifact. Activate this ability only during your upkeep and only once each turn.
flavor_text: "The warm rain of grease on my face immediately made it clear I had entered Phyrexia." —Jarsyl, Diary

name: Gloom
oracle_text: White spells cost {3} more to cast.
Activated abilities of white enchantments cost {3} more to activate.

name: Gravebind
oracle_text: Target creature can't be regenerated this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Guardian Beast
oracle_text: As long as Guardian Beast is untapped, noncreature artifacts you control can't be enchanted, they have indestructible, and other players can't gain control of them. This effect doesn't remove Auras already attached to those artifacts.

name: Hasran Ogress
oracle_text: Whenever Hasran Ogress attacks, it deals 3 damage to you unless you pay {2}.

name: Howl from Beyond
oracle_text: Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.

name: Junún Efreet
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Junún Efreet unless you pay {B}{B}.

name: Lich
oracle_text: As Lich enters the battlefield, you lose life equal to your life total.
You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life.
If you would gain life, draw that many cards instead.
Whenever you're dealt damage, sacrifice that many nontoken permanents. If you can't, you lose the game.
When Lich is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you lose the game.

name: Lim-Dûl's Cohort
oracle_text: Whenever Lim-Dûl's Cohort blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature can't be regenerated this turn.

name: Minion of Tevesh Szat
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, Minion of Tevesh Szat deals 2 damage to you unless you pay {B}{B}.
{T}: Target creature gets +3/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "A minion given over to Tevesh Szat is a stronger minion gained." —Lim-Dûl, the Necromancer

name: Overwhelming Forces
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. Draw a card for each creature destroyed this way.

name: Prowling Nightstalker
oracle_text: Prowling Nightstalker can't be blocked except by black creatures.
flavor_text: Silent as a serpent, twisted as a lone bog tree, evil as Tojira's heart.

name: Rain of Daggers
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures target opponent controls. You lose 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.
flavor_text: Knives in the sky, cries in the air, and blood on the ground.

name: Scavenging Ghoul
oracle_text: At the beginning of each end step, put a corpse counter on Scavenging Ghoul for each creature that died this turn.
Remove a corpse counter from Scavenging Ghoul: Regenerate Scavenging Ghoul.

name: Sengir Vampire
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

name: Sinkhole
oracle_text: Destroy target land.

name: Soul Shred
oracle_text: Soul Shred deals 3 damage to target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.

name: Terror
oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.

name: Warp Artifact
oracle_text: Enchant artifact
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted artifact's controller, Warp Artifact deals 1 damage to that player.

name: Weakness
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-1.

name: Wicked Pact
oracle_text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

name: Word of Command
oracle_text: Look at target opponent's hand and choose a card from it. You control that player until Word of Command finishes resolving. The player plays that card if able. While doing so, the player can activate mana abilities only if they're from lands he or she controls and only if mana they produce is spent to activate other mana abilities of lands he or she controls and/or play that card. If the chosen card is cast as a spell, you control the player while that spell is resolving.

name: Xenic Poltergeist
oracle_text: {T}: Until your next upkeep, target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost.

name: Zombie Master
oracle_text: Other Zombie creatures have swampwalk.
Other Zombies have "{B}: Regenerate this permanent."
flavor_text: They say the Zombie Master controlled these foul creatures even before his own death, but now that he is one of them, nothing can make them betray him.

name: Aladdin
oracle_text: {1}{R}{R}, {T}: Gain control of target artifact for as long as you control Aladdin.

name: Ali from Cairo
oracle_text: Damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

name: Artifact Blast
oracle_text: Counter target artifact spell.
flavor_text: The first line of defense against Urza and Mishra, the Artifact Blast achieved widespread fame until an unlucky mage discovered it was useless on the devices the brothers had already created.

name: Atog
oracle_text: Sacrifice an artifact: Atog gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Bird Maiden
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: "Four things that never meet do here unite To shed my blood and to ravage my heart, A radiant brow and tresses that beguile And rosy cheeks and a glittering smile." —The Arabian Nights, trans. Haddawy

name: Detonate
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact with converted mana cost X. It can't be regenerated. Detonate deals X damage to that artifact's controller.

name: Devastation
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures and lands.
flavor_text: There is much talk about the art of creation. What about the art of destruction?

name: Fire Imp
oracle_text: When Fire Imp enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

name: Fire Tempest
oracle_text: Fire Tempest deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

name: Fireball
oracle_text: Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.
Fireball costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.

name: Fork
oracle_text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell, except that the copy is red. You may choose new targets for the copy.

name: Goblin Bully
flavor_text: It's easy to stand head and shoulders over those with no backbone.

name: Goblin Cavaliers
flavor_text: They get along so well with their goats because they're practically goats themselves.

name: Goblin Caves
oracle_text: Enchant land
As long as enchanted land is a basic Mountain, Goblin creatures get +0/+2.

name: Goblin Firestarter
oracle_text: Sacrifice Goblin Firestarter: Goblin Firestarter deals 1 damage to target creature or player. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.

name: Goblin General
oracle_text: Whenever Goblin General attacks, Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Lead, follow, or run like crazy.

name: Goblin Shrine
oracle_text: Enchant land
As long as enchanted land is a basic Mountain, Goblin creatures get +1/+0.
When Goblin Shrine leaves the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to each Goblin creature.

name: Goblin Warrens
oracle_text: {2}{R}, Sacrifice two Goblins: Put three 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
flavor_text: "Goblins bred underground, their numbers hidden from the enemy until it was too late." —Sarpadian Empires, vol. IV

name: Gorilla War Cry
oracle_text: Cast Gorilla War Cry only during combat before blockers are declared.
Creatures can't be blocked this turn except by two or more creatures.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Last Chance
oracle_text: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

name: Lava Flow
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or land.

name: Mijae Djinn
oracle_text: Whenever Mijae Djinn attacks, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, remove Mijae Djinn from combat and tap it.

name: Ogre Taskmaster
oracle_text: Ogre Taskmaster can't block.
flavor_text: Three little goblins, enjoying their brew. One bumped an ogre, and then there were two.

name: Orcish Mechanics
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Orcish Mechanics deals 2 damage to target creature or player.

name: Primitive Justice
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast Primitive Justice, you may pay {1}{R} and/or {1}{G} any number of times.
Destroy target artifact. For each additional {1}{R} you paid, destroy another target artifact. For each additional {1}{G} you paid, destroy another target artifact, and you gain 1 life.

name: Red Elemental Blast
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Counter target blue spell.
• Destroy target blue permanent.

name: Roc of Kher Ridges
oracle_text: Flying

name: Rock Hydra
oracle_text: Rock Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
For each 1 damage that would be dealt to Rock Hydra, if it has a +1/+1 counter on it, remove a +1/+1 counter from it and prevent that 1 damage.
{R}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Rock Hydra this turn.
{R}{R}{R}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Rock Hydra. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Rockslide Ambush
oracle_text: Rockslide Ambush deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

name: Sedge Troll
oracle_text: Sedge Troll gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Swamp.
{B}: Regenerate Sedge Troll.
flavor_text: The stench in the hovel was overpowering; something loathsome was cooking. Occasionally something surfaced in the thick paste, but my host would casually push it down before I could make out what it was.

name: Shivan Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
{R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: While it's true most Dragons are cruel, the Shivan Dragon seems to take particular glee in the misery of others, often tormenting its victims much like a cat plays with a mouse before delivering the final blow.

name: Smoke
oracle_text: Players can't untap more than one creature during their untap steps.

name: Thunder Dragon
oracle_text: Flying
When Thunder Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each creature without flying.

name: Two-Headed Giant of Foriys
oracle_text: Trample
Two-Headed Giant of Foriys can block an additional creature.

name: Wheel of Fortune
oracle_text: Each player discards his or her hand, then draws seven cards.

name: Alluring Scent
oracle_text: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
flavor_text: No earthly armor is protection against this sweetness.

name: Argothian Pixies
oracle_text: Argothian Pixies can't be blocked by artifact creatures.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Argothian Pixies by artifact creatures.

name: Argothian Treefolk
oracle_text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Argothian Treefolk by artifact sources.

name: Bee Sting
oracle_text: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
flavor_text: Busy as a bumblebee, blistered as a goblin.—Alaborn saying

name: Channel
oracle_text: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {1} to your mana pool.

name: Citanul Druid
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts an artifact spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Citanul Druid.

name: Crumble
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact. It can't be regenerated. That artifact's controller gains life equal to its converted mana cost.

name: Cyclone
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a wind counter on Cyclone, then sacrifice Cyclone unless you pay {G} for each wind counter on it. If you pay, Cyclone deals damage equal to the number of wind counters on it to each creature and each player.

name: Deathcoil Wurm
oracle_text: You may have Deathcoil Wurm assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

name: Drop of Honey
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy the creature with the least power. It can't be regenerated. If two or more creatures are tied for least power, you choose one of them.
When there are no creatures on the battlefield, sacrifice Drop of Honey.

name: Elite Cat Warrior
oracle_text: Forestwalk
flavor_text: "Hear that? No? That's a cat warrior."

name: Fastbond
oracle_text: You may play any number of lands on each of your turns.
Whenever you play a land, if it wasn't the first land you played this turn, Fastbond deals 1 damage to you.

name: Fog
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

name: Force of Nature
oracle_text: Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, Force of Nature deals 8 damage to you unless you pay {G}{G}{G}{G}.

name: Gaea's Avenger
oracle_text: Gaea's Avenger's power and toughness are each equal to 1 plus the number of artifacts your opponents control.

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

name: Instill Energy
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can attack as though it had haste.
{0}: Untap enchanted creature. Activate this ability only during your turn and only once each turn.

name: Ironhoof Ox
oracle_text: Ironhoof Ox can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text: The good news is it's vegetarian. The bad news is it just doesn't like you.

name: Kudzu
oracle_text: Enchant land
When enchanted land becomes tapped, destroy it. That land's controller attaches Kudzu to a land of his or her choice.

name: Lifeforce
oracle_text: {G}{G}: Counter target black spell.

name: Living Lands
oracle_text: All Forests are 1/1 creatures that are still lands.

name: Radjan Spirit
oracle_text: {T}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn.

name: Regrowth
oracle_text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Sandstorm
oracle_text: Sandstorm deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.
flavor_text: Even the landscape turned against Sarsour, first rising up and pelting him, then rearranging itself so he could no longer find his way.

name: Scarwood Bandits
oracle_text: Forestwalk
{2}{G}, {T}: Unless an opponent pays {2}, gain control of target artifact for as long as Scarwood Bandits remains on the battlefield.

name: Scavenger Folk
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Scavenger Folk: Destroy target artifact.

name: Southern Elephant
flavor_text: While defending their southern borders, both the Wu and Shu kingdoms fought against the barbarians' trained elephants.

name: Squall
oracle_text: Squall deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.
flavor_text: "To-night the winds begin to rise . . . The rooks are blown about the skies . . . ." —Alfred, Lord Tennyson, In Memoriam

name: Sylvan Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

name: Titania's Song
oracle_text: Each noncreature artifact loses all abilities and becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost. If Titania's Song leaves the battlefield, this effect continues until end of turn.

name: Tsunami
oracle_text: Destroy all Islands.

name: War Mammoth
oracle_text: Trample

name: Whiptail Wurm
flavor_text: It's hard to say for certain which end is more dangerous.

name: Wild Ox
oracle_text: Swampwalk
flavor_text: It has the run of the swamps, and it knows it.

name: Wood Elemental
oracle_text: As Wood Elemental enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of untapped Forests.
Wood Elemental's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests sacrificed as it entered the battlefield.

name: Aesthir Glider
oracle_text: Flying
Aesthir Glider can't block.
flavor_text: "Sacrilege! A noble ally in life, made nothing more than a glorified kite in death!" —Arna Kennerüd, skycaptain

name: Al-abara's Carpet
oracle_text: {5}, {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures without flying.
flavor_text: Al-abara simply laughed and lifted one finger, and the carpet carried her high out of our reach.

name: Alchor's Tomb
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Target permanent you control becomes the color of your choice. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

name: Amulet of Kroog
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
flavor_text: Among the first allies Urza gained were the people of Kroog. As a sign of friendship, Urza gave the healers of the city potent amulets; afterwards, thousands journeyed to Kroog in hope of healing, greatly adding to the city's glory.

name: Armageddon Clock
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a doom counter on Armageddon Clock.
At the beginning of your draw step, Armageddon Clock deals damage equal to the number of doom counters on it to each player.
{4}: Remove a doom counter from Armageddon Clock. Any player may activate this ability but only during any upkeep step.

name: Ashnod's Altar
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Add {2} to your mana pool.

name: Basalt Monolith
oracle_text: Basalt Monolith doesn't untap during your untap step.
{T}: Add {3} to your mana pool.
{3}: Untap Basalt Monolith.

name: Book of Rass
oracle_text: {2}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card.

name: Bottle of Suleiman
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice Bottle of Suleiman: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, put a 5/5 colorless Djinn artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield. If you lose the flip, Bottle of Suleiman deals 5 damage to you.

name: Brass Man
oracle_text: Brass Man doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {1}. If you do, untap Brass Man.

name: Bronze Horse
oracle_text: Trample
As long as you control another creature, prevent all damage that would be dealt to Bronze Horse by spells that target it.

name: Candelabra of Tawnos
oracle_text: {X}, {T}: Untap X target lands.
flavor_text: Tawnos learned quickly from Urza that utter simplicity often led to wondrous, yet subtle utility.

name: Celestial Sword
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +3/+3 until end of turn. Its controller sacrifices it at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: "So great is its power, only the chosen can wield it and live." —Avram Garrisson, Leader of the Knights of Stromgald

name: Clay Statue
oracle_text: {2}: Regenerate Clay Statue.
flavor_text: Tawnos won fame as Urza's greatest assistant. After he created these warriors, Urza ended his apprenticeship, promoting him directly to the rank of master.

name: Clockwork Avian
oracle_text: Flying
Clockwork Avian enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it.
At end of combat, if Clockwork Avian attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it.

{X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Avian to be greater than four. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Clockwork Gnomes
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Regenerate target artifact creature.
flavor_text: "Until I came to the Floating Isle, I never had to oil the servants." —Baki, wizard attendant

name: Clockwork Swarm
oracle_text: Clockwork Swarm enters the battlefield with four +1/+0 counters on it.
Clockwork Swarm can't be blocked by Walls.
At end of combat, if Clockwork Swarm attacked or blocked this combat, remove a +1/+0 counter from it.

{X}, {T}: Put up to X +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Swarm. This ability can't cause the total number of +1/+0 counters on Clockwork Swarm to be greater than four. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

name: Colossus of Sardia
oracle_text: Trample (If this creature would assign enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it assign the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
Colossus of Sardia doesn't untap during your untap step.
{9}: Untap Colossus of Sardia. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.
flavor_text: Buried under a thin layer of dirt, it was known for centuries as Mount Sardia.

name: Coral Helm
oracle_text: {3}, Discard a card at random: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

name: Cyclopean Tomb
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Put a mire counter on target non-Swamp land. That land is a Swamp for as long as it has a mire counter on it. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

When Cyclopean Tomb is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, at the beginning of each of your upkeeps for the rest of the game, remove all mire counters from a land that a mire counter was put onto with Cyclopean Tomb but that a mire counter has not been removed from with Cyclopean Tomb.

name: Diabolic Machine
oracle_text: {3}: Regenerate Diabolic Machine.
flavor_text: "The bolts of our ballistae smashed into the monstrous thing, but our hopes died in our chests as its gears continued turning." —Sevti Mukul, The Fall of Alsoor

name: Dragon Engine
oracle_text: {2}: Dragon Engine gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Those who believed the city of Kroog would never fall to Mishra's forces severely underestimated the might of his war machines.

name: Ebony Horse
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Untap target attacking creature you control. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

name: Ebony Rhino
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text: "That Rhino would fetch us a tidy sum, Joven. Perhaps it's time to make it ours." —Chandler

name: Floodwater Dam
oracle_text: {X}{X}{1}, {T}: Tap X target lands.
flavor_text: Viscerid dams may be of living creatures as well as bones and mud.

name: Flying Carpet
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

name: Gauntlet of Might
oracle_text: Red creatures get +1/+1.
Whenever a Mountain is tapped for mana, its controller adds {R} to his or her mana pool (in addition to the mana the land produces).

name: Glasses of Urza
oracle_text: {T}: Look at target player's hand.

name: Grapeshot Catapult
oracle_text: {T}: Grapeshot Catapult deals 1 damage to target creature with flying.
flavor_text: For years scholars debated whether these were Urza's or Mishra's creations. Recent research suggests they were invented by the brothers' original master, Tocasia, and that both used these devices.

name: Horn of Deafening
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn.
flavor_text: "A blast, an echo . . . then silence."

name: Ice Cauldron
oracle_text: {X}, {T}: Put a charge counter on Ice Cauldron and exile a nonland card from your hand. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled. Note the type and amount of mana spent to pay this activation cost. Activate this ability only if there are no charge counters on Ice Cauldron.
{T}, Remove a charge counter from Ice Cauldron: Add Ice Cauldron's last noted type and amount of mana to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast the last card exiled with Ice Cauldron.

name: Icy Manipulator
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.

name: Jade Monolith
oracle_text: {1}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, that source deals that damage to you instead.

name: Juggernaut
oracle_text: Juggernaut attacks each turn if able.
Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.
flavor_text: We had taken refuge in a small cave, thinking the entrance was too narrow for it to follow. To our horror, its gigantic head smashed into the mountainside, ripping itself a new entrance.

name: Kormus Bell
oracle_text: All Swamps are 1/1 black creatures that are still lands.

name: Library of Leng
oracle_text: You have no maximum hand size.
If an effect causes you to discard a card, discard it, but you may put it on top of your library instead of into your graveyard.

name: Living Wall
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{1}: Regenerate Living Wall.
flavor_text: Some fiendish mage had created a horrifying wall of living flesh, patched together from a jumble of still-recognizable body parts. As we sought to hew our way through it, some unknown power healed the gaping wounds we cut, denying us passage.

name: Mana Matrix
oracle_text: Instant and enchantment spells you cast cost up to {2} less to cast.

name: Mana Vault
oracle_text: Mana Vault doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {4}. If you do, untap Mana Vault.
At the beginning of your draw step, if Mana Vault is tapped, it deals 1 damage to you.
{T}: Add {3} to your mana pool.

name: Mightstone
oracle_text: Attacking creatures get +1/+0.
flavor_text: While exploring the sacred cave of Koilos with his brother Mishra and their master Tocasia, Urza fell behind in the Hall of Tagsin, where he discovered the remarkable Mightstone.

name: Naked Singularity
oracle_text: Cumulative upkeep {3} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
If tapped for mana, Plains produce {R}, Islands produce {G}, Swamps produce {W}, Mountains produce {U}, and Forests produce {B} instead of any other type.

name: Obelisk of Undoing
oracle_text: {6}, {T}: Return target permanent you both own and control to your hand.
flavor_text: The Battle of Tomakul taught Urza not to rely on fickle reinforcements.

name: Obsianus Golem
flavor_text: "The foot stone is connected to the ankle stone, the ankle stone is connected to the leg stone . . ." —"Song of the Artificer"

name: Onulet
oracle_text: When Onulet dies, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: An early inspiration for Urza, Tocasia's Onulets contained magical essences that could be cannibalized after they stopped functioning.

name: Pentagram of the Ages
oracle_text: {4}, {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
flavor_text: "Take this item, for instance. How would it destroy us, Relicbane?" —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

name: Planar Gate
oracle_text: Creature spells you cast cost up to {2} less to cast.
flavor_text: Nireya reached through the Gate, sensing the energies trapped beyond.

name: Primal Clay
oracle_text: As Primal Clay enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 artifact creature, a 2/2 artifact creature with flying, or a 1/6 Wall artifact creature with defender in addition to its other types. (A creature with defender can't attack.)

name: Rakalite
oracle_text: {2}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn. Return Rakalite to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text: Urza was the first to understand that the war would not be lost for lack of power, but for lack of troops.

name: Ring of Renewal
oracle_text: {5}, {T}: Discard a card at random, then draw two cards.
flavor_text: To the uninitiated, the Ring of Renewal is merely an oddity. For those fluent in the wielding of magic, however, it is a source of great knowledge.

name: Scarecrow
oracle_text: {6}, {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by creatures with flying.
flavor_text: There was more malice in its button eyes than should have been possible in something that had never known life.

name: Shapeshifter
oracle_text: As Shapeshifter enters the battlefield, choose a number between 0 and 7.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may choose a number between 0 and 7.
Shapeshifter's power is equal to the last chosen number and its toughness is equal to 7 minus that number.

name: Sol Ring
oracle_text: {T}: Add {2} to your mana pool.

name: Soldevi Golem
oracle_text: Soldevi Golem doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may untap target tapped creature an opponent controls. If you do, untap Soldevi Golem.
flavor_text: Slow and steady wins the race.

name: Staff of Zegon
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Target creature gets -2/-0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Though Mishra was impressed by the staves Ashnod had created for Zegon's defense, he understood they only hinted at her full potential.

name: Tablet of Epityr
oracle_text: Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: Originally considered the work of Urza, this tablet was created by forgers seeking to imitate Urza's masterpieces.

name: Tawnos's Wand
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

name: Tawnos's Weaponry
oracle_text: You may choose not to untap Tawnos's Weaponry during your untap step.
{2}, {T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 for as long as Tawnos's Weaponry remains tapped.
flavor_text: When Urza's war machines became too costly, Tawnos's weaponry replaced them.

name: Tetravus
oracle_text: Flying
Tetravus enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.

At the beginning of your upkeep, you may remove any number of +1/+1 counters from Tetravus. If you do, put that many 1/1 colorless Tetravite artifact creature tokens onto the battlefield. They each have flying and "This creature can't be enchanted."
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile any number of tokens put onto the battlefield with Tetravus. If you do, put that many +1/+1 counters on Tetravus.

name: Time Vault
oracle_text: Time Vault enters the battlefield tapped.
Time Vault doesn't untap during your untap step.
If you would begin your turn while Time Vault is tapped, you may skip that turn instead. If you do, untap Time Vault.
{T}: Take an extra turn after this one.

name: Triassic Egg
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Put a hatchling counter on Triassic Egg.
Sacrifice Triassic Egg: Choose one —
• You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only if two or more hatchling counters are on Triassic Egg.
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only if two or more hatchling counters are on Triassic Egg.

name: Urza's Chalice
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts an artifact spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: When sorely wounded or tired, Urza would often retreat to the workshops of his apprentices. They were greatly amazed at how much better he looked each time he took a sip of water.

name: Urza's Miter
oracle_text: Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, if it wasn't sacrificed, you may pay {3}. If you do, draw a card.

name: Vibrating Sphere
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control get +2/+0.
As long as it's not your turn, creatures you control get -0/-2.
flavor_text: "Unearthly and invisible fibers emanate from this sphere, entangling all who draw near." —Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

name: Weakstone
oracle_text: Attacking creatures get -1/-0.
flavor_text: During the brothers' childhood, Tocasia took them to explore the sacred cave of Koilos. There, in the Hall of Tagsin, Mishra discovered the mysterious weakstone.

name: Yotian Soldier
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: After Kroog was destroyed while most of its defenders were at his side, Urza vowed that none of his allies would ever need to fear for their own defense again, even while laying siege to a city far from their homes.

name: Badlands
oracle_text: ({T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.)

name: Bayou
oracle_text: ({T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.)

name: City of Brass
oracle_text: Whenever City of Brass becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to you.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

name: Elephant Graveyard
oracle_text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Regenerate target Elephant.

name: Library of Alexandria
oracle_text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you have exactly seven cards in hand.

name: Maze of Ith
oracle_text: {T}: Untap target attacking creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by that creature this turn.

name: Mishra's Workshop
oracle_text: {T}: Add {3} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells.
flavor_text: Though he eventually came to despise Tocasia, Mishra listened well to her lessons on clarity of purpose. Unlike his brother, he focused his mind on a single goal.

name: Oasis
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

name: Plateau
oracle_text: ({T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.)

name: Savannah
oracle_text: ({T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.)

name: Scrubland
oracle_text: ({T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.)

name: Strip Mine
oracle_text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice Strip Mine: Destroy target land.
flavor_text: Unlike previous conflicts, the war between Urza and Mishra made Dominia itself a casualty of war.

name: Taiga
oracle_text: ({T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.)

name: Tropical Island
oracle_text: ({T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.)

name: Tundra
oracle_text: ({T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.)

name: Underground Sea
oracle_text: ({T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.)

name: Urza's Mine
oracle_text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {2} to your mana pool instead.
flavor_text: Mines became common as cities during the days of the artificers.

name: Urza's Power Plant
oracle_text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {2} to your mana pool instead.
flavor_text: Artifact construction requires immense resources.

name: Urza's Tower
oracle_text: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {3} to your mana pool instead.
flavor_text: Urza always put Tocasia's lessons on resource-gathering to effective use.

name: Volcanic Island
oracle_text: ({T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.)
